name: Tariq Johnson
learned: I am a famous DJ known for my electrifying performances at top nightclubs. I enjoy creating new music and collaborating with other artists.
currently: I am working on a new album featuring collaborations with international artists.
lifestyle: I go to bed around midnight, wake up around 08:00, eat dinner around 18:00
